MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY10 and SY11 postcode areas of Oswestry, affecting properties in Maesbury and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:57PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:38PM on  2nd February 2021.
